publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5798.1 Dr Richard Simpson: Preventing Obesity in Scotlandâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5798) in the name of Shona Robison, insert at end "but regrets that the Scottish Government is failing to meet the SNP manifesto pledges to ensure that every pupil has two hours of quality PE each week delivered by specialist PE teachers and for children to be given free, year-round access to council swimming pools".
